name: small stone
description: A small, smooth stone. You feel like throwing it.

name: rusty nail
description: It's rusty but should still do its job well enough.

name: flashlight
description: It's a heavy duty, blue and yellow metal flashlight. You'll turn it on when you need to.

name: rusty metal rod
description: It's a sturdy metal rod about an inch and a half in diameter. It has a grip at one end. Maybe it's a handle of some kind.

name: sledgehammer
description: It's heavy! You bet it could do a lot of damage. Loudly.

name: potion of healing
description: It's a glass bottle with a cork stopper. It has red liquid inside and a label that reads "potion of healing".

name: empty bottle
description: It's an empty glass bottle with a cork stopper. It's labeled "potion of healing".

name: bottle of water
description: It's an glass bottle with a cork stopper filled with water. It's labeled "potion of healing".

name: dusty note
description:
"Lowered into darkness, far and out of sight
Plunged into clear waters, etavoner regains its might."

name: etavoner rune
description: You don't know how you know this, but the rune represents the etavoner charm.

name: eltnamsid rune
description: You don't know how you know this, but the rune represents the eltnamsid charm.

name: lievnu rune
description: You don't know how you know this, but the rune represents the lievnu charm.

name: red fabric
description: The strip of red fabric is faded and tattered.

name: waterlogged journal
description: The cover reads "__HELI_'S JOU___L". It's badly water damaged.

name: ophelia's journal
description: The cover reads "OPHELIA'S JOURNAL". It's badly water damaged.

name: glass scissors
description: They're a pair of scissors. They're the size you would expect except they're made of clear glass.

name: giant mosquito egg
description: It's a whitish color and throbs and shakes. It holds life within. Horrible, horrible life.

name: blight cure
description: It's a small glass vial with a cork stopper. The liquid within shimmers.

name: silver coin
description: It's an ancient silver coin. It's so old that it's been rubbed smooth. Maybe it's lucky.

name: puffball
description: It's an rough sphere the color of bone, about a foot in diameter and covered in dozens of little spikes. It's got an umbilical-like stem with blue veins visible just beneath the surface.

name: iron key
description: It's an iron key.

name: rainbow shell
description: It's a large rainbow-colored shell, probably six inches in diameter, reflecting all the colors of the rainbow. It's one of the most beautiful things you've ever seen.

name: pheromone sac
description: It's a purplish-ish lumpy sac. It was once inside a giant hornet but it's yours now.

name: broken silver box
description: It's a small silver box about 4 inches square and 2 inches deep. It's broken into two pieces. The hinges are completely destroyed and the top and bottom are separated.

name: silver box
description: It's a small silver box about 4 inches square and 2 inches deep. The outside of the box is very ornamental but the inside is empty and devoid of any filligree.

name: map
description: It's a piece of parchment, yellowed with age, depicting a labyrinthine area. Many passages lead to question marks but someone's drawn a line through it, showing the way.

name: crumpled note
description: It's a crumpled, handwritten note.

name: moldy note
description: It's a little blue from the mold but you can read it just fine.

name: folded note
description: It's a paper note, folded in half.

name: root
description: It's a plant with white leaves and a thick, brown, two-pronged root.

name: parchment
description: It's crinkly, faded parchment. There's something written on it...

name: compass
description: It's a compass but the needle doesn't move. Instead, two rings around the outside of its face rotate. The rings spin to a new configuration whenever you move to a new area.
